name: AUTO
description:
AUTO is a Survival Platformer video game that requires the player to survive each level in its own unique conditions.

This game is in development

It is the year 2921,  the machines have won the Earth.  Humans have been running for a long time now.

We have tried to raise many a time and failed,  but this time we shall prevail.  It is time we took back what was ours.  We will need to send in something that could infiltrate their Queen Server.

For that the greatest minds of Earth, Engineer Rick Faranight from the west and Engineer Shaw Nottherookh from the east created 
AUTO

Humanity's last hope...

To make AUTO fast, Its abilities were limited to a small number.
